entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Local amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light near noon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
